amendment.description: To provide that motions to subpoena witnesses or documents shall be in order after the question period.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1292 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 23.
Amendment SA 1292 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S428-429; text: CR S428) To provide that motions to subpoena witnesses or documents shall be in order after the question period.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1292 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 23.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1292 proposed by Senator Schumer.
